channel.title: Does anyone have a code for this?
channel.description: Does anyone have a code for this to make it look like real rs by saying system update in 1:20 ? and the command to be like ::systemupdatenotice 1:25 (and u can change the time on it?) Or something similar to this?

item.title: Does anyone have a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

TY IT WORKS!!! thanks!

item.title: Does anyone have a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
